supplementation is combined with other child survival interventions such as deworming or 
nutrition education (81, 82). Vitamin A supplements are also commonly distributed as part of the 
Expanded Programme on Immunization, particularly at nine months with measles vaccinations. In 
2009, approximately 77% of preschool children were estimated to have received two doses of 
supplements per year
